title: 西咸準備支付天價違約金簽前曼聯神鋒小豆！！！

replies.msg:
English newspaper Standard Sport says West Ham are willing to trigger the £13m escape clause for Hernandez, a 29-year-old Mexico international who is reportedly enthused about the move.

Hernandez joined Leverkusen from Manchester United in 2015 and has since scored 28 goals in 45 League games.

咁睇鋒線幾撚勁 有空霸卡路爾 波牛安仔
宜家仲有走位王小豆 前四有望喎
